schoolMeal.name: School Meal Delivery Platform
schoolMeal.description: A mobile platform for school meal ordering in Egypt. Each school is linked to exactly one assigned supplier—no marketplace, no complexity. Parents order, suppliers prepare in batch, schools distribute and confirm delivery.
problem: Parents lack time to prep healthy meals; kids resort to junk food
Schools have no visibility on what students eat
solution: Parents order from their school's designated supplier
Supplier prepares meals in batch and delivers to the school
School distributes to students and confirms delivery
Payment is released only after confirmation
